If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message.

Issue:
Product page callouts were showing the same zone of protection range across all products due to a shared template, causing rechargeable and fuel-powered devices—and their refills—to display potentially misleading information.

Action Taken:
  • Updated templates to pull the “Zone of protection size” dynamically from product data.
    Device pages now display:
    • Rechargeable: 28 m²
    • Fuel-powered: 21 m²
      Refill pages now display:
    • Liquid refills (for rechargeable devices): 28 m²
    • Fuel + mat refills: 21 m²
  • Implemented a permanent dynamic solution so any changes to product attributes automatically update the callouts.

Conclusion:
  • All product and refill pages now display accurate, product-specific zone ranges.
  • Misleading callouts have been fully resolved, ensuring consistency and clarity for customers.

Hi Bonnie,

I’m happy to let you know that all requested updates for the zone of protection ranges have now been completed and are live across your product and refill pages.

We’ve implemented a dynamic solution that pulls the “Zone of protection size” directly from each product’s data. This ensures the callout box now displays the exact value entered for that product, automatically and consistently.

What’s Updated:

  • Device Product Pages:
    • Rechargeable devices: 28 m²
    • Fuel-powered devices: 21 m²

  • Refill Product Pages:
    • Liquid refills (for rechargeable devices): 28 m²
    • Fuel + mat refills: 21 m²

This change fully resolves the previous inconsistencies and ensures customers see accurate information for each product type.

Please take a moment to review the pages and confirm everything looks correct on your end. If you have any further questions or need assistance, don’t hesitate to reach out—we’re always happy to help!

Hi Bonnie,

Thanks so much for clarifying. We’ll reinstate the 28m2 callout for the liquid refills for the rechargeable devices and make sure the fuel + mat refills display the 21m2 callout.

If you have any other updates or questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out—we’re always happy to help.

Hi Marcelo,

Thanks for your help here.

Can you please reinstate the 28m2 callout for the liquid refills as these are for the rechargeable devices.

The fuel + mat refills are 21m2.

Let me know if you need me to provide you the SKU codes.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager





bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au

Summary Note – Product Page Callout Update

Issue: Product page callouts displaying incorrect range information due to use of a single template for all products.

Client Request:
  • Rechargeable products should display a 28m² range.
  • Fuel-powered products should display an up to 21m² range.
  • Templates should be adjusted so callouts are specific to each product type to avoid misleading customers.

Action Taken:
  • Updated the product pages to display the correct range for rechargeable and fuel-powered products.
  • Adjusted templates so callouts are now specific to each product type.
  • Proactively reviewed other pages and noted that the Refills page does not currently have a zone/range displayed; awaiting client instruction on how to handle this.

Next Steps:
  • Follow up with the client regarding the Refills page to confirm desired display.
  • Monitor the product pages to ensure all callouts display correctly and consistently.

Hi Bonnie,

Just a quick update, we’ve gone ahead and pushed the changes to the product pages. Here’s what’s been updated:

  • Rechargeable products: Display 28m² range
  • Fuel-powered products: Display up to 21m² range
  • Template adjustment: Callouts are now specific to each product type

Fuel Powered Product Categories:

Rechargeable Products Categories:


While reviewing, we noticed that the Refills page does not currently have a zone or range displayed, since these products are neither rechargeable nor fuel-powered. We wanted to check with you what you’d like to show there so everything stays consistent.


If you have any questions or need anything else in the meantime, feel free to let us know us—we’re always happy to help!

Hi Bonnie,

Happy Monday! Thank you for reaching out. We’ll be updating the product pages based on the request:

  • Rechargeable products: Display 28m² range
  • Fuel-powered products: Display up to 21m² range
  • Template adjustment: Ensure the callouts are specific to each product type to avoid any confusion for customers

Our team is on it and will update you as soon as this is resolved. If you have any questions in the meantime, feel free to email us—we’re always happy to help!

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Marcelo Meneses

full_threads.body:
Hi team,

I have noticed that the product pages are all using the same template which can cause issues with some specific callouts, such as the below:



This information is only relevant to the rechargeable products, whereas the fuel-powered devices are up to 21m2. Can this be modified to show the two different ranges? i.e. only display 28m2 on rechargeable and 21m2 on fuel-powered? I don't want any customers feeling like they were mislead.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan
